website_summaries.verdict: Skechers comes up with a sneaker, which has an efficient combination of function and value, the D'Lites. It inducts itself as a staple option for everyday wear. With comfort as its main feature, the sneaker wraps up its overall appeal with stylish accents. Adding a wide variation only makes the sneaker more delightful.
pros: The Skechers D'Lites comes in a myriad of colorways, delighting many shoppers
More than a handful of users with foot and back ailments say that this model is reliable in alleviating pain when walking
It feels comfortable to many users, who describe the feeling as walking on clouds or pillows
Some buyers like the sparkling accent of the sneaker which gives it an additional flair
The D'Lites are not as heavy as cleats but is almost as sturdy and solid, according to a couple of reviewers
A handful of users say that it keeps the feet warm
The sneaker stays clean after a few months of wear, according to one wearer
Some customers are pleased that it comes with an extra set of shoelaces, which is in a different color
The D'Lites' sole adds a little height, which several wearers like,
A lot of customers highly recommend this product
cons: A handful of wearers are annoyed at the heel moving up and down, which leads to pulling the ankle socks inside the sneaker and then rubbing against the ankle heel
The shoelaces don't move smoothly through the eyelets, making it hard to tie, according to some wearers
A couple of users say that driving with the sneaker is uncomfortable and quite hard because of its elevated sole

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My first impressions of these sneakers are great, they are neatly stitched and there are no signs of excess glue on the fabrics. I went on a 10Km walk and experienced zero hotspots and zero moisture, thus no chance of any blistering. The support the sneakers give under the ball of the foot is a new experience for me and only added to the overall comfort. This is my first purchase of Skechers and I have no problems in recommending them. Excellent choice.
customer_reviews.author: Piglet

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo comfy
customer_reviews.text: I am a lover of Skechers footwear owning about 14 pairs of trainers, shoes and boots. This is my 3rd pair of D’lites and they are so comfy, durable and look good. My first pair I bought from America which were expensive. 3 years on and they are still wearing well. Skechers never disappoints and are well worth buying. I love the memory cushion inner sole which make them feel like slippers.
customer_reviews.author: VALMAX

customer_reviews.title: These sketcher are the best I've had yet
customer_reviews.text: These sketcher are the best I've had yet. Previous models I've had have been really light weight but these are seem very hard-wearing and lightweight at the same time. I am usually a size 8.5 but I could only order them in size 8 and they fit perfectly. I will definatly be ordering another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Steve logan

customer_reviews.title: Really Comfortable and Good Looking!
customer_reviews.text: Have worn Skechers for many years and these are as comfortable as any I have had. I would purchase again. As someone with problem feet, the air cooled memory foam makes them so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: Sketchers dlite men’s size 9
customer_reviews.text: Always been a fan of sketchers. Bought these for work to replace old ones I had before lockdown. Very comfortable and look smart Recommend 100% if like me you’re on your feet most of the day for work
customer_reviews.author: JOEL

customer_reviews.title: Nice pair of trainer
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this trainer yesterday and arrive this after. Just the right time for me to test it to walk with my dog. Feel very conformable and right size.
customer_reviews.author: jwlchan

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These trainers are great, extremely comfortable and changeable laces, really good quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Chester

customer_reviews.title: Great design, super duper comfy!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the design, but more importantly, the advanced memory foam in this, 😍. Your feet will never feel uncomfortable, just fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Nav

customer_reviews.title: comfy and lasting well
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my partner. He loves them! He is quite hard on his shoes - despite that they are comfy and lasting well
customer_reviews.author: puzzlehead

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, extremely comfortable to wear and looks great, highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes but take more wearing in that other  Skechers
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look great. They are quite chunky looking. The soles are much harder than other Skechers. Not saying this is a bad thing just takes more time to wear in.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Spain

customer_reviews.title: tight fit
customer_reviews.text: i got 9.5 . i have found it abit tight. saying that. nice product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice design
customer_reviews.text: The outer soles aren't very flexible but apart from that they seem perfect. I'm not wearing them, my son is so I don't know any more than that.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Great footwear
customer_reviews.text: Look great & feel comfortable to wear,... once you get used to the foam insoles.
customer_reviews.author: Am Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Comfortableness
customer_reviews.text: I have been after a pair of these and here we are. So comfortable best shoes ever, highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: james  kemp

customer_reviews.title: Brill would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Most comfy trainers I’ve ever worn, will befo buy another pair
customer_reviews.author: Arthur G.

customer_reviews.title: Fitting size.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived before than expected. I ordered after reading reviews but it did not fit well. I have two other sketchers pairs of size 10 but this size 10 appears smaller and after wearing for 10 mins, toes started to hurt. Not comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Naveedul Haq

customer_reviews.title: skechers
customer_reviews.text: very good & smart but I have not worn them yet
customer_reviews.author: ANDY

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Not only do these trainers look good there very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: craig

customer_reviews.title: Good everyday shoes. Comfortable and well made but bulkier than they look in photos.
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes. Really comfortable and robust at the same time. I happen to be a fan of the design since I had the same shoes in my youth but it may not be everyone’s cup of tea. They’re bulkier than they look. Total dad shoes from the 90s.
customer_reviews.author: R Calanday

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable walked around a theme park all day they was great
customer_reviews.author: James Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: I've bought nothing but skechers memory foam since I first tried them. These were a great fit and super comfy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You'll never buy anything but sketches again
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely so comfortable not a trainer like this so good on the market
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: fitted perfectly and very comfortable,excellent delivery next day.will shop again.
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: Skechers...what else
customer_reviews.text: Great trainers, nice cushioning. A little tight above the toe but is to be expected until they stretch a little as most skechers do. Overall a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Craig pearse

customer_reviews.title: Did exactly what they said they would do. Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: My partner works in a factory on a track and suffered really badly with his feet always having to take pain killers. Since getting these his feet have improved 100%. Great buy and will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Button

customer_reviews.title: Watch the size
customer_reviews.text: I take size 8 uk but with these trainers size 9 fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: william palmer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I usually purchase Globe Sabre Skate Shoes. I saw these and thought I'd try them. Haven't had a pair of shoes with Memory Foam before. They are as comfortable as my Globes. But Lighter. I like the way they fit. And the Style. Looks like I need to make room for Skechers too.Will Definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: El J
